Charlotte’s Web

Welcome to

The MSU

Riley Center

In the heart of downtown Meridian lives a performing arts center and conference facility with a captivating history. Whether you’re here to enjoy a show, learn alongside colleagues, or host a special event, your time will be well-spent at the MSU Riley Center.

Engage Students in the Arts

The MSU Riley Center offers curriculum-based school shows for students of all ages.

$

Contact the Box Office

The box office is open to serve you from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., Monday through Friday.

$

Show Your Support

Your commitment helps the MSU Riley Center bring diverse and extraordinary performing arts to our community.

$

Learn About Our Venue

See what sets us apart—from our restored historic theater to our revitalized downtown setting.

$

Facility Rental

A Versatile & Historic Events Venue

Far removed from the generic and all-too-often bland conference setting, the MSU Riley Center offers striking architecture with authentic Victorian décor. Just like our space, we go beyond the typical to provide expert technical assistance, quality service, and relentless follow-up.
